TopicTitle: Transfer Window Planner + Planet Jam 2 causing errors

Articles.Content:
Playing "Planet Jam 2," in which the homeworld Armstrong is very very deep in the star's gravity well, and um...

Subsequently, the game crashed. KSP.log is here.

For context, Dord is a very small asteroid even closer to the star than Armstrong. It likely has a SoI in the tens of kilometers and is probably fairly inclined. Also, the tidally locked Armstrong has an orbital period of 1 day (6h). However, it should take maybe 5-6x103ms-1 dV, not 5x1013ms-1. Also, the game should not crash.
